## ResourceEditorFactory interface

Factory interface for creating type-specific resource editors. Allows ResolutionView to provide custom editing experiences for different resource types.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ResourceEditorFactory 
```

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

[createEditor(resourceId, resourceType, value)](./ts-res-ui-components.resourceeditorfactory.createeditor.md)


</td><td>

Attempts to create a resource editor for the given resource.


</td></tr>
